summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 18, Denny Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Eastlake Avenue and Franklin Avenue, from Hamlin Street to Edgar Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10345 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
